sentences: Tema isand pidi tõestama raha omandamise illegaalsuseks.
Isadast saab kasu ainult siis, kui see on hea juhendaja.
Poiss ei julge end oma isanda ees väga hästi tundma.
context: The word 'isand' refers to a father or daddy. It's commonly used in family contexts and can also be used more formally or affectionately depending on the situation.
